name: Mogul Moves: A Slimey Mutiny
description:
A Game Made for Ludwig Ahgren & Friends by BMo 

You can mute the music on the Pause menu (escape key). 

Install: Download Zip folder, unzip somewhere, run Mogul Moves A Slimey Mutiny.exe or Mac equivalent

Plot

Ludwig wakens to a world where Slime, his best friend, manager, and mentor at Melee, has taken his viewership - skyrocketing to the #1 Subbed streamer. Ludwig meanwhile is left with a single viewer, and must go out and confront Slime to settle things, because it seemed like a good story at the time.

I made this in about 2 weeks, working on it sparingly (I work full time) using the Unity engine.

Creator Section

Q: Why did you make this?

A: Isn't it obvious? To leech off other's successes, ya dummy... but if you're gonna leech  then you have to do it tastefully by bringing at least something of value. Hopefully this game provides a single moment of content.

Q: Who are you?

A: I run a small YouTube channel where I've been teaching how to make games to beginners. Tutorials are useful and I genuinely enjoy helping people, but I don't want to be tutorial man. I wanna have more fun... making condensed games for clout seemed like a good option to try.

Who knows? If it goes well I'll make a few more for other content creators
